Class AbstractCounterConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.counter.configuration.AbstractCounterConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
StrongCounterConfiguration, WeakCounterConfiguration
public abstract class AbstractCounterConfiguration extends Object
Base counter configuration with its name, initial value and Storage mode.
Since:
9.0
Author:
Pedro Ruivo
